metaface.server
Class VHMLSpeechElement

java.lang.Object
  metaface.server.VHMLSpeechElement
class VHMLSpeechElement
extends Object

This class stores a VHML Speech Element for recall when rendering speech audio

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
VHMLParser, VHMLReader

                         int num_elements)
Constructor for the VHMLSpeechElement object

Parameters:
t_id - The VHMLReader ID of the VHML elements
t_duration - The duration attribute of the VHML elements
isexpression - Whether the speech element is expressive (rather than prosodic)
num_elements - The number of speech elements
